text: [Music]
hello I'm Jeremy a cloud support
engineer here at the AL office in cine
today I'm going to show you how you can
prevent throttling exception or rate
exceeded errors when you use AWS
assistance manager parameter store let's
get
started parameter store requests are
throt told for each AWS account on a per
AWS Reg basis to help service
performance when parameter store API
calls exceed the maximum rate you
receive a rate exceeded error and
further API calls are throttled when
this issue happens take the following
actions to troubleshoot reduce the
frequency of the API course stagger the
intervals of the API course so that they
don't overrun at the same time use apis
that return more than one value for
example if you use the get parameter
apack call then you receive one value
for each call and the request gets
throttled instead use the get parameters
and get parameters by path AP calls
which support 10 parameter retrievals
with one APAC core Implement error
retrice and exponential back off when
you make AP calls if none of these tring
steps resolve your issue then you can
increase the parameter store through put
on the settings stab in the system
manager console this setting applies to
your current account and region when you
increase throughput you increase the
maximum number of transactions per
second DPS that parameter store can
process know that increasing throughput
incurs additional
charges now let's move on to the
demonstration first make sure that your
user account has been granted
permissions to perform SSM get service
setting and SSM update service setting
actions here's the example I policy with
required permissions sign to the a
Management console and navigate to the
assistance manager
console make sure that you are in the
correct region then choose parameter
store choose settings here you can see
the parameter Store throughput settings
the throughput is set to the default
coder
to increase the coder choose set limit
select I accept that changing the
setting incurs charges on my AWS account
choose set limit you can now see that
the throughput is set to the pay tier
increase throughput coder to revert to
the default limit in the future choose
reset
limit if you increase your throughput
but still receive rate exceeded errors
then contact a support to request a
service coder increase so now how you
know how to prevent throttling and
exceeded rates when you use AWS
assistance manager perameter
stool thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
ads
[Music]
